title: "Northwestern engineers invent world's smallest remote-controlled walking robots"
excerpt: "Engineers at Northwestern University have invented the world's smallest remote-controlled walking robots. Each one is about half a millimeter wide, not even as thick as a penny. The students designed robots that looked like crabs and other animals."
